content.raw:
Great. Raise, Lower and Flatten do what I'd have expected but I wasn't able to get Pick Height working or didn't know how to read the result. The different cross does not appear when selected. Is there any way of closing the editor? I wasn't able to get it done. Looks promising, nice job.

I agree with keep this disable until more testing can be done, probably after VRC. It should be safe.
content.html:
Great. Raise, Lower and Flatten do what I'd have expected but I wasn't able to get Pick Height working or didn't know how to read the result. The different cross does not appear when selected. Is there any way of closing the editor? I wasn't able to get it done. Looks promising, nice job.

I agree with keep this disable until more testing can be done, probably after VRC. It should be safe.
